author: "Simas"
date: "February 21, 2016"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
x <- seq(-1, 1, length = 100)
plot(x, sqrt(1 - x^2), type = "l", ylim = c(-1, 1))
lines(x, -sqrt(1 - x^2))
theta <- pi/3
x <- cos(theta)
y <- sin(theta)
points(x, y, cex = 2, pch = 16)
lines(c(0, x), c(0, y), lty = 3)
text(0.15, 0.1, labels = "theta")
text(x + 0.15, y, labels = "(x,y)")
abline(v = 0, col = "gray")
abline(h = 0, col = "gray")
```
